front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for the Communities Attribute of Border Gateway Protocol (BGP-4)

abstract.t: This memo is an extension to the SNMP MIB. It specifies an IAB standards track protocol for the Internet community, and requests discussion and suggestions for improvements. This memo extends the MIB defined in [BGP-MIB]. Distribution of this memo is unlimited. Please forward comments to idr@merit.net.
